code: import Moment from'moment';var helpers={getApi:function getApi(){return'http://proj.ruppin.ac.il/bgroup15/prod/api/';},ReturnDate:function ReturnDate(date){return Moment(date).format('DD/MM/yyyy');},ReturnHour:function ReturnHour(date){return Moment(date).format('HH:mm');},ReturnRandomData:function ReturnRandomData(data){var num=Math.floor(Math.random()*Math.floor(data.length));return data[num];},ReturnRandomNumber:function ReturnRandomNumber(max){return Math.floor(Math.random()*Math.floor(max));}};export default helpers;
